original_title: 夫の存在を感じながら義父と途方もなく密着し濃厚に求め合った7日間 小島みなみ
overview: I fell in love with my father-in-law. After a year of sexlessness, her frustration with her husband grows by the day, and she returns to her husband's parents' house for a week when she is about to lose her raison d'être as a woman. Especially. Her father-in-law, who came to see her frustration at night, sought and loved her body more passionately than she had ever experienced. I just missed her human skin ... I wanted to think so, but as I continued her secret meeting, she began to seek a relationship with her stepfather .... And we reach the shocking last! !
title: She Can Feel Her Husband’s Presence, But She Spent 7 Days Seeking Out Her Father-In-Law For Bewildering, Hard And Tight, Deep And Rich Sex Minami Kojima
